Articles.Content:
hello,

I'm new here and when I was reading some post here I saw some people with cool signatures. I've been searching for a setting to get a signature myself but I can't find it. Can anyone tell me where to find it please?

thanks a lot!

Royal Qube
Not needed anymore, after some more searching, I found out that you need at least 5 posts to have this option enabled.

Once you do have the minimum required number of posts, just go up to the top of the screen where it says "Settings" by your forum handle. On the screen that comes up, there's an area entitled "My settings" along the side navbar; the fourth one under "My Profile" should be "Edit Signature". That's where you go to set signatures up.

Ribbons, in case that's where you're headed next, are at http://ribbons.cgagnier.ca/
